thread.title: UBS Applies for Control of China Joint Venture

author: Stella Yifan Xie
title: UBS Applies for Control of China Joint Venture

organizations.name: ubs applies for control of china joint venture ubs group ag

text:
UBS Group AG became the first foreign bank to seek a controlling stake in its mainland Chinese business under new rules, days after China eased foreign-ownership restrictions.
UBS has applied to increase its stake in Beijing-based UBS Securities Co. to 51% from roughly 25%, the bank said Thursday. Chinaâ€™s stock market regulator said on its website that it had received the application Wednesday, and would review the request.
